title: Jinx and Tristana same Champion confirmed.
body:
Jinx gets move speed on kill or assist, Tristana just jumps the same distance on kill or assist as Jinx travels in the same amount of time.

Jinx fires a CC in a line. Tristana Jumps in a line and CC's in a little area.

Tristana fires a big cannon ball at enemies, Jinx fires a big rocket at enemies.

Tristana kills nearby minions - Jinx rocket splashes nearby minions.

Instead of Dropping Grenades, Tristana puts one on your head.

Jinx gets attack speed for attacking you. Tristana just presses Q and gets attack speed.

100% the same Champion. Riot ples wut r u doen.

replies.body:
Ermergerd illuminarti confurmed! Lmao
In all seriousness (if you are being serious) I've never really thought that before and I play them both.
Lux, Morg, and Nami however all feel so damn similar to me.. Snare ability, Damage Ability and a Shield yourself/ally ability. Their ults are a little more diverse but I guess they all do damage and have pretty good range. They're also all female and supports/mages.
If you're gonna call any champs the same I would have gone with them.

> [{quoted}](name=Level1Pentakill,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ETExbAAV,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-01T12:13:49.514+0000)
>
> Jinx gets move speed on kill or assist, Tristana just jumps the same distance on kill or assist as Jinx travels in the same amount of time.

not if there's a wall in the way

> Jinx fires a CC in a line. Tristana Jumps in a line and CC's in a little area.

the displacement might be in a line, but she actually jumps in an arc

> Tristana fires a big cannon ball at enemies, Jinx fires a big rocket at enemies.

cannon balls and rockets are different. caitlyn fires a bullet, ez fires a giant energy missile.

> Tristana kills nearby minions - Jinx rocket splashes nearby minions.

every ADC does that.

> Instead of Dropping Grenades, Tristana puts one on your head.

Draven drops axes if he doesn't catch them. 

> Jinx gets attack speed for attacking you. Tristana just presses Q and gets attack speed.

MF, twitch, sivir, draven, graves, ashe, quinn, ez, kog, and varus also gain attack speed for doing stuff.

> 100% the same Champion. Riot ples wut r u doen.

r u stoopid?

Arcs aren't lines bro?

"Draven drops axes if he doesn't catch them." Not sure if this is relevant.

"MF, twitch, sivir, draven, graves, ashe, quinn, ez, kog, and varus also gain attack speed for doing stuff."

Yeah but they both have a big Rocket type thing, an attack speed steroid, a kill/assist modifier, a CC and AOE damage on minions.

> [{quoted}](name=Level1Pentakill,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ETExbAAV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-01T13:12:01.563+0000)
>
> Arcs aren't lines bro?
> 
> "Draven drops axes if he doesn't catch them." Not sure if this is relevant.
> 
> "MF, twitch, sivir, draven, graves, ashe, quinn, ez, kog, and varus also gain attack speed for doing stuff."
> 
> Yeah but they both have a big Rocket type thing, an attack speed steroid, a kill/assist modifier, a CC and AOE damage on minions.

tristana doesn't have rockets though.
you would've been better of using draven.

they both have a movement speed boost.
they both have global ults where they launch something.
they both have attack an speed boost.
they both have have a slow.
both their q's give their autos bonus damage.
both their passives relate to kills.
they were both released when the day and month had the same digit, jinx was 10/10, draven was 6/6.
Except tristana doesn't get speed boost or W reset on killing turrets/structures. Tristana have a shorter range than jinx and Tristana ult is not global.
